name: Improved Rending Fury

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Rending Fury, base attack bonus +9, rend special attack.

sections.text: Whenever you successfully rend an opponent, you deal an extra 1d6 damage. This damage is not multiplied on a critical hit.
sections.name: Benefits

description: Honing the deadliness of your claws, you are a living hurricane of rending fury.
